TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdamInstance extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer

summary.span: La classe représente un serveur d'instance AD LDS.

span.span: The class represents an AD LDS instance server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > Le classe fait référence à Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) qui a été renommé en Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).The class refers to Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) which has been renamed to Active Directory Lightweight Directory Services (AD LDS).

span.span: Demand value:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void CheckReplicationConsistency() cil managed

summary.span: Appelle le vérificateur de cohérence des données qui vérifie la topologie de réplication pour cette instance AD LDS.

span.span: Invokes the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) that verifies the replication topology for this AD LDS instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Pour plus d’informations, consultez la rubrique « DsReplicaConsistencyCheck » dans MSDN Library à le [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).For more information, see the topic "DsReplicaConsistencyCheck" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
